Package jdbc

Class DataBaseAreaManagerController

java.lang.Object
jdbc.DataBaseAreaManagerController
public class DataBaseAreaManagerController extends Object
The DataBaseAreaManagerController class appears to be responsible for retrieving information about an Area Manager from a database, specifically their details and the facilities in their area. It does this by using a provided username to query the database for the area the user is responsible for, and then it uses this area to query for all facilities in that area. It also generates notifications for the area manager and package all the information into a ServerMessage object, which is returned to the client.
